SQL_STMT_U.val: Select T0.RefDate,T1.TRANSTYPE, -- S1.DESCRIPTION as 'Transaction', T1.LineMemo as 'Document', T1.TransId as 'Journal Number', T1.ref2 as 'DocNum Beginning Balance', T0.BaseRef as 'DocNum Transaction', t0.taxdate as 'Document Date', T1.Account as 'CoA', T2.AcctName as 'Account Name', T1.Debit, T1.Credit, T1.ProfitCode, V1.CardName, T1.U_IDU_Rmrks, V1.Comments from OJDT as T0 inner join JDT1 T1 on T0.TransId=T1.TransId left join OACT T2 on T1.Account=T2.AcctCode LEFT join RefAndDateAllDoc V1 ON v1.TransId =T0.TransId and v1.ObjType=T0.TransType where :5 between ':1' and ':2' and t1.TransType = :3 and (t2.AcctCode = :6 or t2.FatherNum=:4) ORDER by T1.Account,t1.RefDate,T1.TransId asc

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToDNDataTable(0,'RefDate,Transaction,Document,Journal Number,DocNum Beginning Balance,DocNum Transaction,DocDate,CoA,Account Name,Debit,Credit,ProfitCode,CardName,Comments','Posting Date,Transaction,Document,Journal Number,DocNum Beginning Balance,DocNum Transaction,Document Date,CoA,Account Name,Debit,Credit,ProfitCode,BP,Comments')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT JOURNAL_DT,JOURNAL_ID,Document, [JOURNAL NUMBER],RefNo, [DocNum Transaction],CoA,[Account Name],DEBIT_CURR,CREDIT_CURR, [FCCurrency],DEBIT_HOME,CREDIT_HOME,COST_CENTER,CardName,KET_DT,Comments,isnull(SUM(BALANCE) OVER (PARTITION BY cOA ORDER BY CoA,:13 JOURNAL_DT,[JOURNAL NUMBER] ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)+balance,balance) as 'endingbalance',isnull(SUM(BALANCERP) OVER (PARTITION BY cOA ORDER BY CoA,COST_CENTER,JOURNAL_DT,Document ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING)+balanceRP,balanceRP) as 'endingbalanceRP' FROM ( Select T0.JOURNAL_DT, T0.JOURNAL_ID, Concat(Trim(T1.LNO),IIF(T1.KET_DT = '' OR T1.KET_DT IS NULL,'', ' - '), T1.KET_DT) 'Document', T1.JOURNAL_NO AS 'JOURNAL NUMBER', T3.NumAtCard AS 'RefNo', T3.DOCNUM AS 'DocNum Transaction', T1.ACCOUNT_NO AS 'CoA', T2.AcctName AS 'Account Name', T1.DEBIT_CURR, T1.CREDIT_CURR,IIF(T1.CURR_ID=':8',0,T1.DEBIT_CURR-T1.CREDIT_CURR *iif(t2.Advance='D',1,-1)) AS 'BALANCE', Coalesce(T1.CURR_ID,':8') as 'FCCurrency', T1.DEBIT_HOME, T1.CREDIT_HOME,T1.DEBIT_HOME-T1.CREDIT_HOME *iif(t2.Advance='D',1,-1) AS 'BALANCERP', T1.COST_CENTER, T3.CardName, T1.KET_DT, T3.Comments From GL_JURNALH T0 (nolock) JOIN GL_JURNALD T1 (nolock) on T1.Co_id=T0.Co_id and T1.Br_id=T0.Br_id and T1.JOURNAL_NO=T0.JOURNAL_NO LEFT JOIN OACT T2 (nolock) on T1.ACCOUNT_NO = T2.AcctCode LEFT JOIN ALLDOC_VIEW T3 on T1.JOURNAL_NO = T3.TrackNo WHERE T0.Co_id=':6' and T0.JOURNAL_DT between ':1' and ':2' and T0.JOURNAL_ID = :3 and T0.STATUS='P' and (T2.AcctCode = :5 or T2.FatherNum=:4) UNION ALL select ':9','00000','Saldo',' ',' ',null,ACCOUNT_NO,AcctName,0,0,SALDO,':8',0,0,SALDORP,cc,' ',' ',' ' FROM ( SELECT ACCOUNT_NO,AcctName,cc, SUM(saldo) SALDO, SUM(saldoRP) SALDORP FROM ( select ACCOUNT_NO,m.AcctName,iif(:12=1,cost_center,'') CC, sum(:11) saldoRP,0 SALDO from gl_balance v (nolock) LEFT JOIN OACT m (nolock) on m.AcctCode=v.ACCOUNT_NO where co_id=':6' AND FISCAL_YEAR=:7 AND CURR_ID=':8' AND M.Postable='Y' and (m.AcctCode = :5 or m.FatherNum=:4) group by ACCOUNT_NO,m.AcctName,iif(:12=1,cost_center,'') UNION ALL select ACCOUNT_NO,m.AcctName,iif(:12=1,cost_center,'') CC, 0,sum(:11) saldo from gl_balance v (nolock) LEFT JOIN OACT m (nolock) on m.AcctCode=v.ACCOUNT_NO where co_id=':6' AND FISCAL_YEAR=:7 AND CURR_ID<>':8' AND M.Postable='Y' and (m.AcctCode = :5 or m.FatherNum=:4) group by ACCOUNT_NO,m.AcctName,iif(:12=1,cost_center,'') UNION ALL SELECT T0.ACCOUNT_NO,m.AcctName,iif(:12=1,cost_center,'') CC, SUM((T0.DEBIT_HOME-T0.CREDIT_HOME)* Iif(m.Advance='D',1,-1)),SUM((T0.DEBIT_CURR-T0.CREDIT_CURR)* Iif(m.Advance='D',1,-1)) FROM GL_LEDGER_VIEW T0 LEFT JOIN OACT m (nolock) on m.AcctCode=T0.ACCOUNT_NO where co_id=':6' AND JOURNAL_DT BETWEEN ':9' AND ':10' AND STATUS='P' and T0.JOURNAL_ID = :3 and (m.AcctCode = :5 or m.FatherNum=:4) GROUP BY ACCOUNT_NO,m.AcctName,iif(:12=1,cost_center,'') )X GROUP BY ACCOUNT_NO,AcctName,CC )Y )A order by A.CoA,:13 JOURNAL_DT,[JOURNAL NUMBER]

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToDNDataTable(0,'RefDate,Transaction,Document,Journal Number,DocNum Beginning Balance,DocNum Transaction,DocDate,CoA,Account Name,Debit,Credit,ProfitCode,CardName,Comments','Posting Date,Transaction,Document,Journal Number,DocNum Beginning Balance,DocNum Transaction,Document Date,CoA,Account Name,Debit,Credit,ProfitCode,BP,Comments')

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select T0.JOURNAL_DT, T0.JOURNAL_ID, Concat(Trim(T1.LNO),IIF(T1.KET_DT = '' OR T1.KET_DT IS NULL,'', ' - '), T1.KET_DT) 'Document', T1.JOURNAL_NO AS 'JOURNAL NUMBER', T3.NumAtCard AS 'DocNum Beginning Balance', T3.DOCNUM AS 'DocNum Transaction', T1.ACCOUNT_NO AS 'CoA', T2.AcctName AS 'Account Name', T1.DEBIT_CURR, T1.CREDIT_CURR, Coalesce(T1.CURR_ID,'IDR') as 'FCCurrency', T1.DEBIT_HOME, T1.CREDIT_HOME, T1.COST_CENTER, T3.CardName, T1.KET_DT, T3.Comments From GL_JURNALH T0 JOIN GL_JURNALD T1 on T1.Co_id=T0.Co_id and T1.Br_id=T0.Br_id and T1.JOURNAL_NO=T0.JOURNAL_NO LEFT JOIN OACT T2 on T1.ACCOUNT_NO = T2.AcctCode LEFT JOIN ALLDOC_VIEW T3 on T1.JOURNAL_NO = T3.TrackNo WHERE T0.Co_id=':6' and T0.JOURNAL_DT between ':1' and ':2' and T0.JOURNAL_ID = :3 and (T2.AcctCode = :5 or T2.FatherNum=:4) ORDER by T1.ACCOUNT_NO, T1.JOURNAL_DT, T1.JOURNAL_NO asc

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToDNDataTable(0,'RefDate,Transaction,Document,Journal Number,DocNum Beginning Balance,DocNum Transaction,DocDate,CoA,Account Name,Debit,Credit,ProfitCode,CardName,Comments','Posting Date,Transaction,Document,Journal Number,DocNum Beginning Balance,DocNum Transaction,Document Date,CoA,Account Name,Debit,Credit,ProfitCode,BP,Comments')

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select T0.RefDate, S1.DESCRIPTION as 'Transaction', T1.LineMemo as 'Document', T1.TransId as 'Journal Number', T1.ref2 as 'DocNum Beginning Balance', T0.BaseRef as 'DocNum Transaction',T0.TaxDate, T1.Account as 'CoA', T2.AcctName as 'Account Name', T1.Debit, T1.Credit, Coalesce(T1.FCCurrency,'IDR') as 'FCCurrency', T1.FCDebit, T1.FCCredit, T1.ProfitCode,V1.CardName, T1.U_IDU_Rmrks, V1.Comments from OJDT as T0 inner join JDT1 T1 on T0.TransId=T1.TransId inner JOIN ATM.DBO.SYS_GCM S1 ON S1.CONDITION = 'OBJTYPE' AND GCM_ID = T1.TRANSTYPE left join OACT T2 on T1.Account=T2.AcctCode LEFT join RefAndDateAllDoc V1 ON v1.TransId =T0.TransId and v1.ObjType=T0.TransType where :5 between ':1' and ':2' and t1.TransType = :3 and (t2.AcctCode = :6 or t2.FatherNum=:4) ORDER by T1.Account,t1.RefDate,T1.TransId asc
select Account,SUM(Debit) as 'Sum Debit',SUM(Credit) as 'Sum Credit', SUM(FCDebit) as 'Sum Debit FC',SUM(FCCredit) as 'Sum Credit FC' from JDT1 where account = ':1' and :3 < ':2' Group By Account

Select T0.JOURNAL_DT, S1.DESCRIPTION as 'Transaction', Concat(Trim(T1.LNO),IIF(T1.KET_DT = '' OR T1.KET_DT IS NULL,'', ' - '), T1.KET_DT) as 'Document', T1.JOURNAL_NO as 'Journal Number', T3.NumAtCard as 'DocNum Beginning Balance', T3.DOCNUM as 'DocNum Transaction', T1.ACCOUNT_NO as 'CoA', T2.AcctName as 'Account Name', T1.DEBIT_HOME, T1.CREDIT_HOME, Coalesce(T1.CURR_ID,':6') as 'FCCurrency', T1.DEBIT_AMT, T1.CREDIT_AMT, T1.COST_CENTER, T3.CardName, T1.KET_DT, T3.Comments, IIF(ISNULL(T3.U_IDU_Kode_PT,'')='', '', CONCAT(trim(T3.U_IDU_Kode_PT), ' - ', trim(P.PrcName))) as Consignee, IIF(ISNULL(T1.COST_CENTER, '')='', '', CONCAT(trim(T1.COST_CENTER), ' - ', trim(C.OcrName))) as OcrName, T3.U_IDU_Kode_PT as ConsigneeCode, GA.CURR_ID AS GACurr, GA.F_NORMAL AS GA_F_NORMAL From GL_JURNALH T0 (nolock) JOIN GL_JURNALD T1 (nolock) on T1.Co_id=T0.Co_id and T1.Br_id=T0.Br_id and T1.JOURNAL_NO = T0.JOURNAL_NO LEFT JOIN OACT T2 (nolock) on T1.ACCOUNT_NO = T2.AcctCode INNER JOIN SYS_GCM S1 (nolock) ON S1.CONDITION = 'OBJTYPE' AND GCM_ID = T0.JOURNAL_ID LEFT JOIN ALLDOC_VIEW T3 (nolock) on T1.JOURNAL_NO = T3.TrackNo LEFT JOIN OPRC P (nolock) ON P.PrcCode = T3.U_IDU_Kode_PT LEFT JOIN OOCR C (nolock) ON C.OcrCode = T1.COST_CENTER LEFT JOIN GL_ACCOUNT GA ON GA.CO_ID = T1.CO_ID AND GA.ACCOUNT_NO = T1.ACCOUNT_NO where T0.Co_id=':7' and T0.JOURNAL_DT between ':1' and ':2' and T0.JOURNAL_ID = :3 and T0.STATUS='P' and (T2.AcctCode = :5 or T2.FatherNum=:4) ORDER by T1.ACCOUNT_NO ,:8 T1.JOURNAL_DT, T1.JOURNAL_NO asc

Select SUM(BALFC),Sum(BEGINNING_BALANCE) FROM ( Select 0 BALFC,iif(:9=1,BEGINNING_AMT,ISNULL(ENDING_:4,0)) BEGINNING_BALANCE From GL_BALANCE B (nolock) Join OACT A (nolock) On B.ACCOUNT_NO = A.AcctCode Where co_id=':5' and br_id=':6' and fiscal_year=:7 and ACCOUNT_NO = ':1' AND CURR_ID<>':8' and cost_center=:10 UNION ALL Select iif(:9=1,BEGINNING_AMT,ISNULL(ENDING_:4,0)) BEGINNING_BALANCE,0 From GL_BALANCE B (nolock) Join OACT A (nolock) On B.ACCOUNT_NO = A.AcctCode Where co_id=':5' and br_id=':6' and fiscal_year=:7 and ACCOUNT_NO = ':1' AND CURR_ID=':8' and cost_center=:10 UNION ALL Select ISNULL(IIF(O.Advance = 'D', DEBIT_HOME-CREDIT_HOME, CREDIT_HOME - DEBIT_HOME),0),ISNULL(IIF(O.Advance = 'D', DEBIT_AMT-CREDIT_AMT, CREDIT_AMT - DEBIT_AMT),0) From GL_LEDGER_VIEW LV LEFT JOIN OACT O (nolock) ON LV.ACCOUNT_NO = O.AcctCode Where ACCOUNT_NO = ':1' AND JOURNAL_DT BETWEEN ':2' AND ':3' and status='P' and cost_center=:10 ) X

Select T0.JOURNAL_DT, S1.DESCRIPTION as 'Transaction', Concat(Trim(T1.LNO),IIF(T1.KET_DT = '' OR T1.KET_DT IS NULL,'', ' - '), T1.KET_DT) as 'Document', T1.JOURNAL_NO as 'Journal Number', T3.NumAtCard as 'DocNum Beginning Balance', T3.DOCNUM as 'DocNum Transaction', T1.ACCOUNT_NO as 'CoA', T2.AcctName as 'Account Name', T1.DEBIT_HOME, T1.CREDIT_HOME, Coalesce(T1.CURR_ID,':6') as 'FCCurrency', T1.DEBIT_AMT, T1.CREDIT_AMT, T1.COST_CENTER, T3.CardName, T1.KET_DT, T3.Comments, IIF(ISNULL(T3.U_IDU_Kode_PT,'')='', '', CONCAT(trim(T3.U_IDU_Kode_PT), ' - ', trim(P.PrcName))) as Consignee, IIF(ISNULL(T1.COST_CENTER, '')='', '', CONCAT(trim(T1.COST_CENTER), ' - ', trim(C.OcrName))) as OcrName, T3.U_IDU_Kode_PT as ConsigneeCode From GL_JURNALH T0 (nolock) JOIN GL_JURNALD T1 (nolock) on T1.Co_id=T0.Co_id and T1.Br_id=T0.Br_id and T1.JOURNAL_NO = T0.JOURNAL_NO LEFT JOIN OACT T2 (nolock) on T1.ACCOUNT_NO = T2.AcctCode INNER JOIN SYS_GCM S1 (nolock) ON S1.CONDITION = 'OBJTYPE' AND GCM_ID = T0.JOURNAL_ID LEFT JOIN ALLDOC_VIEW T3 (nolock) on T1.JOURNAL_NO = T3.TrackNo LEFT JOIN OPRC P (nolock) ON P.PrcCode = T3.U_IDU_Kode_PT LEFT JOIN OOCR C (nolock) ON C.OcrCode = T1.COST_CENTER where T0.Co_id=':7' and T0.JOURNAL_DT between ':1' and ':2' and T0.JOURNAL_ID = :3 and (T2.AcctCode = :5 or T2.FatherNum=:4) ORDER by T1.ACCOUNT_NO ,T1.JOURNAL_DT, T1.JOURNAL_NO asc

Select SUM(BALFC),Sum(BEGINNING_BALANCE) FROM ( Select 0 BALFC,iif(:9=1,BEGINNING_AMT,ISNULL(ENDING_:4,0)) BEGINNING_BALANCE From GL_BALANCE B (nolock) Join OACT A (nolock) On B.ACCOUNT_NO = A.AcctCode Where co_id=':5' and br_id=':6' and fiscal_year=:7 and ACCOUNT_NO = ':1' AND CURR_ID<>':8' UNION ALL Select iif(:9=1,BEGINNING_AMT,ISNULL(ENDING_:4,0)) BEGINNING_BALANCE,0 From GL_BALANCE B (nolock) Join OACT A (nolock) On B.ACCOUNT_NO = A.AcctCode Where co_id=':5' and br_id=':6' and fiscal_year=:7 and ACCOUNT_NO = ':1' AND CURR_ID=':8' UNION ALL Select ISNULL(IIF(O.Advance = 'D', DEBIT_HOME-CREDIT_HOME, CREDIT_HOME - DEBIT_HOME),0),ISNULL(IIF(O.Advance = 'D', DEBIT_AMT-CREDIT_AMT, CREDIT_AMT - DEBIT_AMT),0) From GL_LEDGER_VIEW LV LEFT JOIN OACT O (nolock) ON LV.ACCOUNT_NO = O.AcctCode Where ACCOUNT_NO = ':1' AND JOURNAL_DT BETWEEN ':2' AND ':3' and status='P' ) X

Select T0.JOURNAL_DT, S1.DESCRIPTION as 'Transaction', Concat(Trim(T1.LNO),IIF(T1.KET_DT = '' OR T1.KET_DT IS NULL,'', ' - '), T1.KET_DT) as 'Document', T1.JOURNAL_NO as 'Journal Number', T3.NumAtCard as 'DocNum Beginning Balance', T3.DOCNUM as 'DocNum Transaction', T1.ACCOUNT_NO as 'CoA', T2.AcctName as 'Account Name', T1.DEBIT_HOME, T1.CREDIT_HOME, Coalesce(T1.CURR_ID,':6') as 'FCCurrency', T1.DEBIT_AMT, T1.CREDIT_AMT, T1.COST_CENTER, T3.CardName, T1.KET_DT, T3.Comments From GL_JURNALH T0 (nolock) JOIN GL_JURNALD T1 (nolock) on T1.Co_id=T0.Co_id and T1.Br_id=T0.Br_id and T1.JOURNAL_NO = T0.JOURNAL_NO LEFT JOIN OACT T2 on T1.ACCOUNT_NO = T2.AcctCode INNER JOIN SYS_GCM S1 (nolock) ON S1.CONDITION = 'OBJTYPE' AND GCM_ID = T0.JOURNAL_ID LEFT JOIN ALLDOC_VIEW T3 on T1.JOURNAL_NO = T3.TrackNo where T0.Co_id=':7' and T0.JOURNAL_DT between ':1' and ':2' and T0.JOURNAL_ID = :3 and (T2.AcctCode = :5 or T2.FatherNum=:4) ORDER by T1.ACCOUNT_NO ,T1.JOURNAL_DT, T1.JOURNAL_NO asc

Select SUM(BALFC),Sum(BEGINNING_BALANCE) FROM ( Select 0 BALFC,iif(:9=1,BEGINNING_AMT,ISNULL(ENDING_:4,0)) BEGINNING_BALANCE From GL_BALANCE B (nolock) Join OACT A (nolock) On B.ACCOUNT_NO = A.AcctCode Where co_id=':5' and br_id=':6' and fiscal_year=:7 and ACCOUNT_NO = ':1' AND CURR_ID<>':8' UNION ALL Select iif(:9=1,BEGINNING_AMT,ISNULL(ENDING_:4,0)) BEGINNING_BALANCE,0 From GL_BALANCE B (nolock) Join OACT A (nolock) On B.ACCOUNT_NO = A.AcctCode Where co_id=':5' and br_id=':6' and fiscal_year=:7 and ACCOUNT_NO = ':1' AND CURR_ID=':8' UNION ALL Select ISNULL(IIF(O.Advance = 'D', DEBIT_HOME-CREDIT_HOME, CREDIT_HOME - DEBIT_HOME),0),ISNULL(IIF(O.Advance = 'D', DEBIT_AMT-CREDIT_AMT, CREDIT_AMT - DEBIT_AMT),0) From GL_LEDGER_VIEW LV LEFT JOIN OACT O (nolock) ON LV.ACCOUNT_NO = O.AcctCode Where ACCOUNT_NO = ':1' AND JOURNAL_DT BETWEEN ':2' AND ':3' and status='P' ) X

Select T0.RefDate, S1.DESCRIPTION as 'Transaction', T1.LineMemo as 'Document', T1.TransId as 'Journal Number', T1.ref2 as 'DocNum Beginning Balance', T0.BaseRef as 'DocNum Transaction', t0.taxdate as 'Document Date', T1.Account as 'CoA', T2.AcctName as 'Account Name', T1.Debit, T1.Credit, T1.ProfitCode, V1.CardName, V1.Comments from OJDT as T0 inner join JDT1 T1 on T0.TransId=T1.TransId inner JOIN ATM.DBO.SYS_GCM S1 ON S1.CONDITION = 'OBJTYPE' AND GCM_ID = T1.TRANSTYPE left join OACT T2 on T1.Account=T2.AcctCode LEFT join RefAndDateAllDoc V1 ON v1.TransId =T0.TransId where :5 between ':1' and ':2' and t1.TransType = :3 and t2.FatherNum = :4 ORDER by T1.Account,t1.RefDate,T1.TransId asc

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToDNDataTable(0,'RefDate,Transaction,Document,Journal Number,DocNum Beginning Balance,DocNum Transaction,DocDate,CoA,Account Name,Debit,Credit,ProfitCode,CardName,Comments','Posting Date,Transaction,Document,Journal Number,DocNum Beginning Balance,DocNum Transaction,Document Date,CoA,Account Name,Debit,Credit,ProfitCode,BP,Comments')
